articles.author: Peter
articles.title: Nothing Phone (2) and black Ear (2) are now available - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Open sales of the new phone have begun in North America, Europe and Australia, it's still on pre-order in South America and most of the Asian-Pacific region.
articles.content:
The Nothing Phone (2) is now available in Europe, North and Central America, along with certain other regions. Joining the new phone are the Nothing Ear (2) buds in the new black color.

articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Extreme weather alert: Heatwaves and torrential rains grip Europe, US, Asia. 10 updates | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Scorching heatwaves grip Japan, Europe, and the US, fueling wildfires and posing severe threats. Italy braces for an unprecedented heatwave, while Japan and the US face record-breaking temperatures. Asia battles torrential rains and deadly floods.
articles.content: Scorching heatwaves have taken hold of three continents, manifesting the alarming consequences of global warming. Asia, Europe, and the United States are grappling with record-breaking temperatures, … [+2438 chars]
